title: Windows Server 2003 x86_64 delayed to March 2005
body: <a href="http://bink.nu/DesktopModules/ArticleDetail.aspx?ArticleID=2211">Damnit MS</a>, I want my damn 64 bit OS.  The beta I'm running now is at least at the release candidate level as far as stability goes.  Does that mean XP x86_64 will be delayed too?  I'm guessing it is just driver issues and 3rd party software holding it up, although the word on the streets is that they are waiting for Intel (who is strategically sitting on their thumbs as far as x86_64 goes, thanks Intel for delaying the game yet again, jerks).
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-07-26

Windows Server 2003 x86_64 delayed to March 2005

bodyNavItems.text: SpongeBob SquarePants, The Movie (Bigger. Squarier. Spongier. More Absorbant.)
Windows Server 2003 x86_64 delayed to March 2005
